Posts.EditableText: You know what would come in handy for Quest?   How about adding some Notes tabs so that we could jot notes for the different sections that we're working on.  Maybe add an "Overall Notes" section in the main screen, and then have a "Notes" page on each tab.  It would really help with planning, and organizing stuff.
Posts.HTML: You know what would come in handy for Quest? How about adding some Notes tabs so that we could jot notes for the different sections that we're working on. Maybe add an "Overall Notes" section in the main screen, and then have a "Notes" page on each tab. It would really help with planning, and organizing stuff.

Posts.EditableText: Go to the game object, and the features tab. Tick "Annotations: adds a tab to rooms where authors notes can be made, not seen by players". There will then be a "Notes" tab for every room.
Posts.HTML: Go to the game object, and the features tab. Tick "Annotations: adds a tab to rooms where authors notes can be made, not seen by players". There will then be a "Notes" tab for every room.
